entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain early in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
